block.p: Michelle Norkus and Scott F. Kreitz were married yesterday at St. Catharine Church in Spring Lake, N.J. Msgr. Thomas A. Luebking, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony.
Mrs. Kreitz, 34, is a senior marketing manager at Hearst Magazines in New York. She graduated from Georgetown. She is a daughter of Joan Geiger Norkus and Donald P. Norkus of Fair Haven, N.J.
Michelle Norkus and Scott F. Kreitz were married yesterday at St. Catharine Church in Spring Lake, N.J. Msgr. Thomas A. Luebking, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony.
Michelle Norkus and Scott F. Kreitz were married yesterday at St. Catharine Church in Spring Lake, N.J. Msgr. Thomas A. Luebking, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony.
Mrs. Kreitz, 34, is a senior marketing manager at Hearst Magazines in New York. She graduated from Georgetown. She is a daughter of Joan Geiger Norkus and Donald P. Norkus of Fair Haven, N.J.
Her father is a business coach who runs a consulting company in Fair Haven. Her mother owns Boxwood, an interior design firm in Fair Haven.
Mr. Kreitz, 33, is a senior associate in the sales and trading division at Lehman Brothers in New York. He graduated from Brown, where he also received a master's degree in geological sciences.
He is the son of Kathleen Claire Kreitz of Brielle, N.J., and the late Frederick J. Kreitz. His mother is an administrative assistant at Howell Township Elementary School in Howell, N.J.
